content: this is a free 1 crochet pattern to make a hound dog **increase your pattern collection** 2 purchase the pdf here 3 **supplies ** 4mm crochet hook 4/medium weight yarn in main color and contrast color 10mm safety eyes 10mm oval safety nose tapestry needle scissors and stuffing **additional information ** difficulty **easy** this pattern refers to main color this is the main color you will use for your dog we start by creating the head which leads into the body and tail this is crocheted in all one piece next we make the eyes and eyelids if desired we then create the ears arms and legs and collar then we re done 1 https //stringydingding com/cartoon-hound-dog-amigurumi-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //stringydingding com/product/cartoon-hound-dog-pdf/ 3 https //stringydingding com/product/cartoon-hound-dog-pdf/
